snippet: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan said in a television interview that two armored military vehicles had been targeted by the separatist Kurdistan Workers’ Party in Hakkari Province.
abstract: Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan says several soldiers died in attack on armored vehicles carried out by separatist Kurdistan Workers’ Party; details of attack remain unclear.
lead_paragraph: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan said in a television interview that two armored military vehicles had been targeted by the separatist Kurdistan Workers’ Party in Hakkari Province.

headline.main: Kurdish Rebels Kill Soldiers in Attack, Turkish President Says
headline.print_headline: Kurdish Rebels Kill Soldiers in Attack, Turkish President Says
